channel.title: ~~~~ExemplifyPkz~~~~Making a new 317 team!
channel.description:
[size=24pt]*NOTE!: YOU MUST HAVE MSN OR SKYPE![/size]
[size=24pt]~~~~INFO~~~~[/size] This server will have many players due to the Advertiser(Making videos/Inviting friends) and posting this server on MoparScape, and other RSPS advertising sites.
[size=24pt]~~~~ROLES~~~~[/size] Hoster[1/1]-Must be able to host the server.(Me) General Coder[1/1]-Must know EVERYTHING about coding a source and a client. And I mean EVERYTHING. Forums Master[0/1]-Must be able to make a top nauch forum, and monitor it. GFX Designer[0/1]-Must be able to create a Pro logo for our server. Advertiser[0/2]-Must be able to make youtube videos. Idea Guy[0/2]-Must be able to generate great ideas to improve the server.(Including helping me find a good source)
[size=24pt]~~~~STAFF BENEFITS~~~~[/size]
-The General Coder, Forums Master, GFX Designer, Advertiser, and Idea Guy will get their share of the donations. -The Administrators/Moderators will get free donator status(Along with additional commands)
[size=24pt]~~~~APPLICATION~~~~[/size]
Which role do you want?:
What is your age?:
What country do you live in?:
Do you have any past experience? If so, tell me/show me:
Do you have anyone to back up what you're saying?:
MSN or Skype username:
Please fill out this application and send it in a PM or comment below.
[size=24pt]*NOTE!: YOU MUST HAVE MSN OR SKYPE![/size] Having these accounts will make it easier to explain things.

item.title: ~~~~ExemplifyPkz~~~~Making a new 317 team!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“mod_vespa, post:3, topic:391729”]Which role do you want?: ingame admin or coder

What is your age?: 15

What country do you live in?: belgium

Do you have any past experience? If so, tell me/show me: project-italian (you know it)

Do you have anyone to back up what you’re saying?: yes (you saw my server)

MSN or Skype username: rspsfreak@hotmail.be

Please fill out this application and send it in a PM or comment below.[/quote]

@mod_vespa
Declined.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~~ExemplifyPkz~~~~Making a new 317 team!
item.dc:creator: @Sins_World Sins World
item.description:
@Sins_World wrote:

[center]Which role do you want?: In-Game Adminstartor / Coding help (I can code most not EVERYTHING lol.[/center]

[center]What is your age?: 14 & 5 Months 50 Days[/center]

[center]What country do you live in?: I currently live in texas, Hotel but in 2 weeks i will be at my house[/center]

[center]Do you have any past experience? If so, tell me/show me: Yes i do, but i will show you my experience on teamviewer | I’ve hosted 2 servers by my self, been admin, mod, and co-owner on a lot of servers | What i can code is a fancy home, training, w/e. I can modifty, make, or wat you want me to do with shops, and i can do a lot with commands, …I can do a lot more just not much space | My name is Austin btw[/center]

[center]Do you have anyone to back up what you’re saying?: I’ve just started back up coding like 2 weeks ago so i’m looking forward to meeting you on MSN.[/center]

[center]MSN or Skype username: Austin_clay_newton@hotmail.com[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~~ExemplifyPkz~~~~Making a new 317 team!

You repeated Google twice under the ‘Info’ section of the thread. And post more or add more information about the server because I don’t see a thing about the server; add some media as well, it’s recommended.
[/quote]

Ya I’m still looking for a source/client.[/quote]Well enjoy looking, there are literally thousands.

Read full topic
